auth_dialog.title: Authentication Required
auth_dialog.description_part2: requires authentication. Please enter your username and password.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

errors.readability_failed: Readability could not extract content from this page. Try "Original" mode instead.
errors.proxy_failed: Failed to start proxy server. Use the "Source" button to open in browser.
errors.proxy_failed_with_msg: Failed to start proxy server: {{message}}. Use the "Source" button to open in browser.
errors.no_selector_config: No selector or custom CSS configured for this feed.
errors.selectors_no_content: Selectors found no content. Check configuration.

auth_config.description: Configure credentials to log in to this feed's site and access subscriber-only content.
auth_config.login_url_help: The URL to which the login form submits data.
auth_config.extra_fields_help: Additional fields required by the form. Leave empty to automatically retrieve the value from the form (e.g., CSRF token).
auth_config.response_selector_help: CSS selector to extract a message from the response (e.g., welcome message).
auth_config.logout_url_help: URL to call (GET) after fetching the article to logout from the session.
